title: Save $140 on a lifetime subscription to PDF Extra
content:
Macworld

Need to keep the layout of your document intact? PDF is the file format for you. The problem is, once you save it in that format, it’s practically impossible to edit after the fact — unless you use a tool such as PDF Extra.

With a 4.5 out of 5-star rating on Trustpilot, PDF Extra is one of the best PDF editors out there right now. You can use it to add or remove text, change fonts, insert images, resize individual elements, add colors, and more. It’ll also let you create PDFs from just about any type of file, which is great if you work with a variety of documents throughout the day.

Do you deal with legal forms? Then PDF Extra is a must-have accessory. That’s because it automatically fills in data for you, so it has the potential to save you a ton of time each day. And, it has a feature for leaving a digital signature, too. When you consider how much time you waste fiddling around with document formatting, having a tool like PDF Extra on hand is a no-brainer.
